019package com.plotsquared.core.util;
020
021import com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus;
022import com.intellectualsites.annotations.DoNotUse;
023import com.plotsquared.core.PlotSquared;
024import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
025import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
026import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerAutoPlotEvent;
027import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerAutoPlotsChosenEvent;
028import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerClaimPlotEvent;
029import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerEnterPlotEvent;
030import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerLeavePlotEvent;
031import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerPlotDeniedEvent;
032import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerPlotHelperEvent;
033import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerPlotTrustedEvent;
034import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerTeleportToPlotEvent;
035import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotAutoMergeEvent;

037import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotClaimedNotifyEvent;
038import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotClearEvent;
039import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotComponentSetEvent;
040import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotDeleteEvent;
041import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotDoneEvent;

044import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotFlagRemoveEvent;
045import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotMergeEvent;
046import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotRateEvent;
047import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotUnlinkEvent;
048import com.plotsquared.core.events.TeleportCause;
049import com.plotsquared.core.events.post.PostPlayerAutoPlotEvent;
050import com.plotsquared.core.events.post.PostPlotChangeOwnerEvent;
051import com.plotsquared.core.events.post.PostPlotDeleteEvent;
052import com.plotsquared.core.events.post.PostPlotMergeEvent;
053import com.plotsquared.core.events.post.PostPlotUnlinkEvent;

055import com.plotsquared.core.location.Direction;
056import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
057import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;

061import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotId;
062import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Rating;
063import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.PlotFlag;
064import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.DeviceInteractFlag;
065import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.MiscPlaceFlag;
066import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.MobPlaceFlag;
067import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.PlaceFlag;
068import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.UseFlag;
069import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.VehiclePlaceFlag;
070import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.types.BlockTypeWrapper;
071import com.plotsquared.core.plot.world.SinglePlotArea;
072import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.TaskManager;
073import com.sk89q.worldedit.WorldEdit;
074import com.sk89q.worldedit.function.pattern.Pattern;
075import com.sk89q.worldedit.world.block.BlockType;
076import com.sk89q.worldedit.world.block.BlockTypes;
077import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.Template;
078import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
079import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
080
081import java.util.ArrayList;
082import java.util.List;
083import java.util.UUID;
084
085@DoNotUse
086public class EventDispatcher {
087
088    private final EventBus eventBus = new EventBus("PlotSquaredEvents");
089    private final List<Object> listeners = new ArrayList<>();
090    private final WorldEdit worldEdit;
091
092    public EventDispatcher(final @Nullable WorldEdit worldEdit) {
093        this.worldEdit = worldEdit;
094    }
095
096    public void registerListener(Object listener) {
097        eventBus.register(listener);
098        listeners.add(listener);
099    }
100
101    public void unregisterListener(Object listener) {
102        eventBus.unregister(listener);
103        listeners.remove(listener);
104    }
105
106    public void unregisterAll() {
107        for (Object listener : listeners) {
108            eventBus.unregister(listener);
109        }
110    }
111
112    public void callGenericEvent(final @NonNull Object event) {
113        eventBus.post(event);
114    }
115
116    public void callEvent(final @NonNull PlotEvent event) {
117        eventBus.post(event);
118    }
119
120    public PlayerClaimPlotEvent callClaim(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot, String schematic) {
121        PlayerClaimPlotEvent event = new PlayerClaimPlotEvent(player, plot, schematic);
122        callEvent(event);
123        return event;
124    }
125
126    public PlayerAutoPlotEvent callAuto(
127            PlotPlayer<?> player, PlotArea area, String schematic,
128            int size_x, int size_z
129    ) {
130        PlayerAutoPlotEvent event =
131                new PlayerAutoPlotEvent(player, area, schematic, size_x, size_z);
132        callEvent(event);
133        return event;
134    }
135
136    public PostPlayerAutoPlotEvent callPostAuto(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot) {
137        PostPlayerAutoPlotEvent event = new PostPlayerAutoPlotEvent(player, plot);
138        callEvent(event);
139        return event;
140    }
141
142    public PlayerAutoPlotsChosenEvent callAutoPlotsChosen(
143            PlotPlayer<?> player, List<Plot> plots
144    ) {
145        PlayerAutoPlotsChosenEvent event =
146                new PlayerAutoPlotsChosenEvent(player, plots);
147        callEvent(event);
148        return event;
149    }
150
151    public PlotClaimedNotifyEvent callPlotClaimedNotify(Plot plot, boolean auto) {
152        PlotClaimedNotifyEvent event = new PlotClaimedNotifyEvent(plot, auto);
153        callEvent(event);
154        return event;
155    }
156
157    public PlayerTeleportToPlotEvent callTeleport(PlotPlayer<?> player, Location from, Plot plot, TeleportCause cause) {
158        PlayerTeleportToPlotEvent event = new PlayerTeleportToPlotEvent(player, from, plot, cause);
159        callEvent(event);
160        return event;
161    }
162
163    public PlotComponentSetEvent callComponentSet(Plot plot, String component, Pattern pattern) {
164        PlotComponentSetEvent event = new PlotComponentSetEvent(plot, component, pattern);
165        callEvent(event);
166        return event;
167    }
168
169    public PlotClearEvent callClear(Plot plot) {
170        PlotClearEvent event = new PlotClearEvent(plot);
171        callEvent(event);
172        return event;
173    }
174
175    public PlotDeleteEvent callDelete(Plot plot) {
176        PlotDeleteEvent event = new PlotDeleteEvent(plot);
177        callEvent(event);
178        return event;
179    }
180
181    public PostPlotDeleteEvent callPostDelete(Plot plot) {
182        PostPlotDeleteEvent event = new PostPlotDeleteEvent(plot);
183        callEvent(event);
184        return event;
185    }
186
187    public PlotFlagAddEvent callFlagAdd(PlotFlag<?, ?> flag, Plot plot) {
188        PlotFlagAddEvent event = new PlotFlagAddEvent(flag, plot);
189        callEvent(event);
190        return event;
191    }
192
193    public PlotFlagRemoveEvent callFlagRemove(PlotFlag<?, ?> flag, Plot plot) {
194        PlotFlagRemoveEvent event = new PlotFlagRemoveEvent(flag, plot);
195        callEvent(event);
196        return event;
197    }
198
199    public PlotMergeEvent callMerge(Plot plot, Direction dir, int max, PlotPlayer<?> player) {
200        PlotMergeEvent event = new PlotMergeEvent(plot.getWorldName(), plot, dir, max, player);
201        callEvent(event);
202        return event;
203    }
204
205    public PostPlotMergeEvent callPostMerge(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot) {
206        PostPlotMergeEvent event = new PostPlotMergeEvent(player, plot);
207        callEvent(event);
208        return event;
209    }
210
211    public PlotAutoMergeEvent callAutoMerge(Plot plot, List<PlotId> plots) {
212        PlotAutoMergeEvent event = new PlotAutoMergeEvent(plot.getWorldName(), plot, plots);
213        callEvent(event);
214        return event;
215    }
216
217    public PlotUnlinkEvent callUnlink(
218            PlotArea area, Plot plot, boolean createRoad,
219            boolean createSign, PlotUnlinkEvent.REASON reason
220    ) {
221        PlotUnlinkEvent event = new PlotUnlinkEvent(area, plot, createRoad, createSign, reason);
222        callEvent(event);
223        return event;
224    }
225
226    public PostPlotUnlinkEvent callPostUnlink(Plot plot, PlotUnlinkEvent.REASON reason) {
227        PostPlotUnlinkEvent event = new PostPlotUnlinkEvent(plot, reason);
228        callEvent(event);
229        return event;
230    }
231
232    public PlayerEnterPlotEvent callEntry(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot) {
233        PlayerEnterPlotEvent event = new PlayerEnterPlotEvent(player, plot);
234        callEvent(event);
235        return event;
236    }
237
238    public PlayerLeavePlotEvent callLeave(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot) {
239        PlayerLeavePlotEvent event = new PlayerLeavePlotEvent(player, plot);
240        callEvent(event);
241        return event;
242    }
243
244    public PlayerPlotDeniedEvent callDenied(
245            PlotPlayer<?> initiator, Plot plot, UUID player,
246            boolean added
247    ) {
248        PlayerPlotDeniedEvent event = new PlayerPlotDeniedEvent(initiator, plot, player, added);
249        callEvent(event);
250        return event;
251    }
252
253    public PlayerPlotTrustedEvent callTrusted(
254            PlotPlayer<?> initiator, Plot plot, UUID player,
255            boolean added
256    ) {
257        PlayerPlotTrustedEvent event = new PlayerPlotTrustedEvent(initiator, plot, player, added);
258        callEvent(event);
259        return event;
260    }
261
262    public PlayerPlotHelperEvent callMember(
263            PlotPlayer<?> initiator, Plot plot, UUID player,
264            boolean added
265    ) {
266        PlayerPlotHelperEvent event = new PlayerPlotHelperEvent(initiator, plot, player, added);
267        callEvent(event);
268        return event;
269    }
270
271    public PlotChangeOwnerEvent callOwnerChange(
272            PlotPlayer<?> initiator, Plot plot, UUID oldOwner,
273            UUID newOwner, boolean hasOldOwner
274    ) {
275        PlotChangeOwnerEvent event =
276                new PlotChangeOwnerEvent(initiator, plot, oldOwner, newOwner, hasOldOwner);
277        callEvent(event);
278        return event;
279    }
280
281    public PostPlotChangeOwnerEvent callPostOwnerChange(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot, @Nullable UUID oldOwner) {
282        PostPlotChangeOwnerEvent event = new PostPlotChangeOwnerEvent(player, plot, oldOwner);
283        callEvent(event);
284        return event;
285    }
286
287    public PlotRateEvent callRating(PlotPlayer<?> player, Plot plot, Rating rating) {
288        PlotRateEvent event = new PlotRateEvent(player, rating, plot);
289        eventBus.post(event);
290        return event;
291    }
292
293    public PlotDoneEvent callDone(Plot plot) {
294        PlotDoneEvent event = new PlotDoneEvent(plot);
295        callEvent(event);
296        return event;
297    }
298
299    public void doJoinTask(final PlotPlayer<?> player) {
300        if (player == null) {
301            return; //possible future warning message to figure out where we are retrieving null
302        }
303        if (PlotSquared.platform().expireManager() != null) {
304            PlotSquared.platform().expireManager().handleJoin(player);
305        }
306        if (this.worldEdit != null) {
307            if (player.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
308                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("worldedit.worldedit_bypassed"));
309            }
310        }
311        final Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
312        if (Settings.Teleport.ON_LOGIN && plot != null && !(plot
313                .getArea() instanceof SinglePlotArea)) {
314            TaskManager.runTask(() -> plot.teleportPlayer(player, TeleportCause.LOGIN, result -> {
315            }));
316            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleported_to_road"));
317        }
318    }
319
320    public void doRespawnTask(final PlotPlayer<?> player) {
321        final Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
322        if (Settings.Teleport.ON_DEATH && plot != null) {
323            TaskManager.runTask(() -> plot.teleportPlayer(player, TeleportCause.DEATH, result -> {
324            }));
325            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleported_to_road"));
326        }
327    }
328
329    public boolean checkPlayerBlockEvent(
330            PlotPlayer<?> player, @NonNull PlayerBlockEventType type,
331            Location location, BlockType blockType, boolean notifyPerms
332    ) {
333        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
334        assert area != null;
335        if (!area.buildRangeContainsY(location.getY()) && !player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_HEIGHT_LIMIT)) {
336            player.sendMessage(
337                    TranslatableCaption.of("height.height_limit"),
338                    Template.of("minHeight", String.valueOf(area.getMinBuildHeight())),
339                    Template.of("maxHeight", String.valueOf(area.getMaxBuildHeight()))
340            );
341            return false;
342        }
343        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
344        if (plot != null) {
345            if (plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
346                return true;
347            }
348        }
349        switch (type) {
350            case TELEPORT_OBJECT:
351                return false;
352            case READ:
353                return true;
354            case INTERACT_BLOCK: {
355                if (plot == null) {
356                    final List<BlockTypeWrapper> use = area.getRoadFlag(UseFlag.class);
357                    for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : use) {
358                        if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(BlockTypes.AIR) || blockTypeWrapper.accepts(blockType)) {
359                            return true;
360                        }
361                    }
362                    return player.hasPermission(
363                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD.toString(), notifyPerms
364                    );
365                }
366                if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
367                    return player.hasPermission(
368                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED.toString(), notifyPerms
369                    );
370                }
371                final List<BlockTypeWrapper> use = plot.getFlag(UseFlag.class);
372                for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : use) {
373                    if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(BlockTypes.AIR) || blockTypeWrapper
374                            .accepts(blockType)) {
375                        return true;
376                    }
377                }
378                if (player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER.toString(), false)) {
379                    return true;
380                }
381                if (notifyPerms) {
382                    player.sendMessage(
383                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.flag_tutorial_usage"),
384                            Template.of("flag", PlaceFlag.getFlagName(UseFlag.class))
385                    );
386                }
387                return false;
388            }
389            case TRIGGER_PHYSICAL: {
390                if (plot == null) {
391                    final List<BlockTypeWrapper> use = area.getRoadFlag(UseFlag.class);
392                    for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : use) {
393                        if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(BlockTypes.AIR) || blockTypeWrapper.accepts(blockType)) {
394                            return true;
395                        }
396                    }
397                    return player.hasPermission(
398                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD.toString(), false
399                    );
400                }
401                if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
402                    return player.hasPermission(
403                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED.toString(), false
404                    );
405                }
406                if (plot.getFlag(DeviceInteractFlag.class)) {
407                    return true;
408                }
409                List<BlockTypeWrapper> use = plot.getFlag(UseFlag.class);
410                for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : use) {
411                    if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(BlockTypes.AIR) || blockTypeWrapper
412                            .accepts(blockType)) {
413                        return true;
414                    }
415                }
416                return player.hasPermission(
417                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER.toString(),
418                        false
419                );
420            }
421            case SPAWN_MOB: {
422                if (plot == null) {
423                    return player.hasPermission(
424                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD.toString(), notifyPerms
425                    );
426                }
427                if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
428                    return player.hasPermission(
429                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED.toString(), notifyPerms
430                    );
431                }
432                if (plot.getFlag(MobPlaceFlag.class)) {
433                    return true;
434                }
435                List<BlockTypeWrapper> place = plot.getFlag(PlaceFlag.class);
436                for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : place) {
437                    if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(BlockTypes.AIR) || blockTypeWrapper
438                            .accepts(blockType)) {
439                        return true;
440                    }
441                }
442                if (player.hasPermission(
443                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER.toString(),
444                        false
445                )) {
446                    return true;
447                }
448                if (notifyPerms) {
449                    player.sendMessage(
450                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.flag_tutorial_usage"),
451                            Template.of("flag", PlotFlag.getFlagName(MobPlaceFlag.class)
452                                    + '/' + PlotFlag.getFlagName(PlaceFlag.class))
453                    );
454                }
455                return false;
456            }
457            case PLACE_MISC: {
458                if (plot == null) {
459                    return player.hasPermission(
460                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD.toString(), notifyPerms
461                    );
462                }
463                if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
464                    return player.hasPermission(
465                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED.toString(), notifyPerms
466                    );
467                }
468                if (plot.getFlag(MiscPlaceFlag.class)) {
469                    return true;
470                }
471                List<BlockTypeWrapper> place = plot.getFlag(PlaceFlag.class);
472                for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : place) {
473                    if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(BlockTypes.AIR) || blockTypeWrapper
474                            .accepts(blockType)) {
475                        return true;
476                    }
477                }
478                if (player.hasPermission(
479                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER.toString(),
480                        false
481                )) {
482                    return true;
483                }
484                if (notifyPerms) {
485                    player.sendMessage(
486                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.flag_tutorial_usage"),
487                            Template.of("flag", PlotFlag.getFlagName(MiscPlaceFlag.class)
488                                    + '/' + PlotFlag.getFlagName(PlaceFlag.class))
489                    );
490                }
491                return false;
492            }
493            case PLACE_VEHICLE:
494                if (plot == null) {
495                    return player.hasPermission(
496                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD.toString(), notifyPerms
497                    );
498                }
499                if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
500                    return player.hasPermission(
501                            Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED.toString(), notifyPerms
502                    );
503                }
504                return plot.getFlag(VehiclePlaceFlag.class);
505            default:
506                break;
507        }
508        return true;
509    }
510
511}
